name: Yobbo
description: The Yobbo is a small humanoid creature adept at ambushing spellcasters. It has a notable appearance due to its ability to consume magical items.
memorable: The Yobbo can explode on death, releasing a random spell, making it a unique and dangerous foe.
goals: To consume magical items and disrupt spellcasters.
relations: May typically be found near magic users or hoarding magical trinkets.
environment: Commonly found in areas with magical influences or near spellcasters.
strengths: Proficient in stealth and arcana, allowing it to sneak up on magical targets and identify their items.
weaknesses: Low Strength and Wisdom scores make it vulnerable in direct combat and against wisdom-based effects.
attacks: Mangler attack deals slashing damage; Spike Ball attack can deal bludgeoning damage from a distance.
most_powerful_ability: The Magic Eater ability allows it to consume magical items, potentially gaining their powers.
senses: Possesses darkvision, allowing it to see in dim light and darkness, which aids in its stealth.
skills: Highly skilled in stealth and arcana, allowing for effective sneaking and magical identification.
additional_information: Can mangle a target's hand on a critical hit, rendering it useless for a time.
Acts unpredictably upon being reduced to zero hit points due to its explosive death ability.
